<p>The first time I wrote something for my new Job at <a href="https://ruxit.com">Ruxit.com</a>. We spent about three weeks to push the site’s loading performance to a possible max, without us having the possibility to reduce the page’s weight. <a href="https://blog.ruxit.com/how-we-sped-up-ruxit-com/">This is the write-up of our endeavour</a>.</p>
